__________________________________________________________
### Objective  
Work collaboratively and reproducibly to create a story involving data.  

There are two story options.   
1) Write a short manuscript style story including an Intro, Materials and Methods, Results, Discussion, and Conclusions.  
2) Create a relational database or data-handling system and write a story about the process.  

### Final outputs  
* A dynamic report which includes text, code, and figures  
* A 20 minute presentation  

### Grading  
* All collaboration must occur through GitHub  
* Instructors must be able to reproduce every document  
* Must include demonstration of tidy data   
* Must incorporate good data visualization principles  
* Story must be coherent
